entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
